forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High around 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this evening followed by occasional showers late. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early. Then periods of showers late. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 62F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 14C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 58F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a few clouds from time to time. High near 15C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies with gusty winds. High near 60F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High around 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
